problems.name: Two Sum
problems.description: Find two numbers that add up to target

problems.name: Binary Search
problems.description: Search for target in sorted array

problems.name: Merge Sorted Arrays
problems.description: Merge two sorted arrays in-place

problems.name: Remove Duplicates
problems.description: Remove duplicates from sorted array in-place

problems.name: Search Insert Position
problems.description: Find position where target should be inserted

problems.name: First and Last Position
problems.description: Find first and last position of target in sorted array

problems.name: Linear Search
problems.description: Find the index of a target element in an unsorted array

problems.name: Find Maximum and Minimum
problems.description: Find both the maximum and minimum elements in array in a single pass.

problems.name: Kadane's Algorithm with Indices
problems.description: Find the maximum sum subarray and return both the sum and the start/end indices of the subarray.

problems.name: Maximum Subarray Sum
problems.description: Find maximum sum of k consecutive elements

problems.name: Minimum Subarray Sum
problems.description: Find the minimal length of a contiguous subarray whose sum is greater than or equal to the target.

problems.name: Longest Substring Without Repeating
problems.description: Find length of longest substring without repeating characters

problems.name: Longest Substring with K distincts
problems.description: Find the lenght of the longest substring that contains at most k distinct characters

problems.name: Fruits into Baskets
problems.description: Pick fruits from trees in baskets (one fruit type per basket). Find the maximum number of fruits you can collect with two baskets

problems.name: Find all anagrams
problems.description: Given two strings, return an array of all the start indices of s1's anagrams in s2

problems.name: Longest Repeating Character Replacement
problems.description: Find the length of the longest substring with the same characters after replacing at most k characters.

problems.name: Minimum Window Substring
problems.description: Find minimum window containing all characters of pattern

problems.name: Sliding Window Maximum
problems.description: Find maximum in each sliding window of size k

problems.name: Permutation in String
problems.description: Check if string contains permutation of pattern

problems.name: Valid Anagram
problems.description: Check if two strings are anagrams

problems.name: Group Anagrams
problems.description: Group strings that are anagrams of each other

problems.name: Top K Frequent Elements
problems.description: Find k most frequent elements in array

problems.name: Intersection of Arrays
problems.description: Find intersection of two arrays

problems.name: Contains Duplicate
problems.description: Check if array contains duplicates

problems.name: Find all duplicates
problems.description: Find all the elements that appear twice in an array

problems.name: Union of Arrays
problems.description: Find the union of two arrays (all unique elements)

problems.name: Character Frequency Count
problems.description: Count the frequency of each character in a string and return as a hashmap

problems.name: First Non-Repeating Character
problems.description: Find the first character in a string that doesn't repeat. Return its index or -1

problems.name: Longest Consecutive Sequence
problems.description: Find length of longest consecutive sequence

problems.name: Subarray Sum Equals K
problems.description: Find the total number of continuous subarrays whose sum equals k

problems.name: 4SumII
problems.description: Given four arrays, count tuples (i, j, k, l) such that A[i] + B[j] + C[k] + D[l] = 0

problems.name: Valid Sudoku
problems.description: Determine if a 9x9 sudoku board is valid (partially filled, checking existing numbers only)

problems.name: Valid Parentheses
problems.description: Check if parentheses are properly balanced

problems.name: Daily Temperatures
problems.description: Find days until warmer temperature

problems.name: Evaluate Postfix Expression
problems.description: Evaluate postfix mathematical expression

problems.name: Implement Stack with Queues
problems.description: Implement stack using only queue operations

problems.name: Implement Queue with Stacks
problems.description: Implement queue using only stack operations

problems.name: Sliding Window Maximum
problems.description: Find maximum in sliding window using deque

problems.name: First Negative in Window
problems.description: Find the first negative number in every window of size k in an array

problems.name: Reverse Linked List
problems.description: Reverse a singly linked list

problems.name: Find Middle Node
problems.description: Find the middle node of a linked list. If even, return the second middle node

problems.name: Linked List Cycle Detection
problems.description: Detect if linked list has a cycle

problems.name: Find Cycle Start
problems.description: Find where cycle begins in linked list

problems.name: Merge Two Sorted Lists
problems.description: Merge two sorted linked lists

problems.name: Remove Duplicates from Sorted List
problems.description: Remove duplicate nodes from a sorted list, keeping only unique values

problems.name: Remove Nth From End
problems.description: Remove nth node from end of list

problems.name: Palindrome Linked List
problems.description: Check if linked list is palindrome

problems.name: Add Two Numbers
problems.description: Add numbers represented as linked lists

problems.name: Intersection of Two Lists
problems.description: Find intersection point of two linked lists

problems.name: Partition List
problems.description: Partition a linked list around value x, with all nodes < x before nodes >= x
